Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Actors.Planes

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actors.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actors.Planes.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Actors.Planes.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
Boss class represents boss fighter plane in game. Boss class extends FighterPlane class and implements specific behaviors for bossplane, such as strategies for movement, firing and shielding.

  • Constructor Details

    • Boss

      public Boss(ComponentsFactory factory, ImgAssetLoader assetLoader)
      Constructs new boss instance. Initialises bossplane with its image, health bar, shield and each different strategies such as strategies for movement, firing and shielding.
      Parameters:
      factory - : ComponentsFactory used for components creation.
      assetLoader - : ImgAssetLoader used for loading images.

      Returns:

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles damage taking of bossplane. If boss is shielded, applies the glowing effect; otherwise, reduces boss's health and updates health bar.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • getProjectileInitialPosition

      public double getProjectileInitialPosition()

      initial Y position of boss's projectile.
